attributes.action: Personally thank Johnny Depp for his recent contributions to Great Omond Street
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Johny Depp has recently given 1 million of his own money and persuaded Disney to give 10 million to Great Ormond Street Children's Hospital in gratitude for them saving his daughters life. 

 He has also had his costume flown in and attended the hospital to read stories to the children without publicity.

I think we should acknowledge this publically, if only to 'enourage the others'!
